statements: SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, soil_moisture FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE soil_moisture > 50;
SELECT id, pump_status FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE pump_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, weather_data FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE soil_moisture < 30;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT id, soil_moisture FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE soil_moisture > 50 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE pump_status = TRUE
SELECT id, weather_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE weather_data->>'location' = 'Garden'
SELECT id, soil_moisture, pump_status FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE soil_moisture < 30 AND pump_status = FALSE
SELECT id, soil_moisture, pump_status FROM IrrigationSystemData WHERE soil_moisture BETWEEN 40 AND 60
SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, humidity, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
SELECT id, temperature, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, location, status, last_checked FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%'
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(rainfall) FROM WeatherData WHERE recorded_at >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE water_flow_rate > 0 ORDER BY last_checked DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE id = 1
SELECT timestamp, humidity, temperature FROM WeatherData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM IrrigationSchedule
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT wd.id, s.sensor_id, wd.temperature, sm.moisture_level FROM WeatherData wd JOIN SoilMoisture sm ON wd.id = sm.id
SELECT id, sensor_id, start_time, duration FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT system_name, location, max_capacity FROM irrigation_systems
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id < 10 AND installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM irrigation_systems WHERE max_capacity > 100 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT s.sensor_name, w.timestamp, w.temperature FROM sensors s JOIN weather_data w ON s.sensor_id = w.weather_id WHERE w.temperature > 25 ORDER BY w.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, name, location FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status = true;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, log_timestamp, amount_watered FROM IrrigationLogs WHERE amount_watered >= 10;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE pressure < 1000 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT id, location FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE status = TRUE LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM IrrigationLogs WHERE amount_watered BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE forecasted_humidity < 60
